subject: Hockey, Ice
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: James Neal’s goal gave Pittsburgh a 3-1 lead in its first-round series with Tampa Bay. The Sabres, meanwhile, evened their series with the Flyers at 2-2.
snippet: James Neal’s goal gave Pittsburgh a 3-1 lead in its first-round series with Tampa Bay. The Sabres, meanwhile, evened their series with the Flyers at 2-2.
